comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: On May 28, 1914, there was the annual garden party on Governors Island. Mrs. Borden Harriman is mentioned first on the list of guests in NYT of May 29, 1914. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B05E0D8173AE633A... Could this be there?
